com.waes.service

Class DiffService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.waes.service.DiffService

  • @Service
public class DiffService
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the Service class. This class in the middle tier between the Controller and the DB. It bridges the calls from the browser with the Repository. This class also defines the logic behind the methods exposed by the Controller.
    Author:
    ccamarena

    • Method Detail

      • getAll

        public java.util.List<Message> getAll()
        This method returns all the messages in the DB in a given moment. It leverages the findAll built-in to the CRUD Repository.
        Returns:
        List of messages in the DB.

      • setMessage

        public Message setMessage(java.lang.String id,
                          java.lang.String message,
                          java.lang.String side)
        This method saves the message in the DB.
        Parameters:
        id - String binding the left and right messages to be compared
        message - Encoded Message
        side - Indicates which side the messages belongs to

      • getDiffs

        public java.lang.String getDiffs(java.lang.String id)
        This method performs the differences between left and right messages under the same id.
        Parameters:
        id - String to identify the messages to be compared
        Returns:

      • getTextByIdAndSide

        public java.lang.String getTextByIdAndSide(java.lang.String id,
                                           java.lang.String side)
        This method get the text from DB given the id and the side.
        Parameters:
        id - Id of the message to retrieve
        side - Side of the message to retrieve
        Returns:
        Text from message in the DB according to Id and side

      • compareSides

        public java.lang.String compareSides(java.lang.String left,
                                     java.lang.String right)
        This method performs the comparison between the 2 texts. It assumes the messages are in JSON format once they are decoded.
        Parameters:
        left - Left text
        right - Right text
        Returns:
        JSON string with the results of the comparison
